about_the_game:
"Nora" is a newcomer cat orc adventurer, you will operate the heroine to experience adventure, whether you can see the whole thing, and change the fate of the cat orc family.

Game features:
Randomly generate dungeons for you to explore


During the battle, the clothing will be destroyed


When you are naked, be careful that the monster catches it, you will be pornographic


More than 15 weapon modes, 4 types of equipment combinations can be used for combat

content_descriptors.notes:
For your information, all characters are aged 18 or above.

Content contains nudity, pornography, Interracial sex with non human fantasy and Non-consensual sex, please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.

About the Game

"Nora" is a newcomer cat orc adventurer, you will operate the heroine to experience adventure, whether you can see the whole thing, and change the fate of the cat orc family.

Game features:
Randomly generate dungeons for you to explore


During the battle, the clothing will be destroyed


When you are naked, be careful that the monster catches it, you will be pornographic

name: Dungeons And Cat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows®7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen5 1600 / Intel i5-6400 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 | AMD R9 380X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows®7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen5 5600X / Intel i7-10700 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 | AMD RX5600XT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible

Traditional Chinese*, English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*
